alert.note: Alert for Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 09 at 5:11PM CDT until August 09 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL WALKER AND SOUTHWESTERN BLOUNT COUNTIES... At 511 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Arkadelphia, or 13 miles northeast of Sumiton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hayden, Sipsey, Bangor, Arkadelphia, Blount Springs, Smoke Rise and Rickwood Caverns. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
